title.bibl: Onze Toekomst, Jan. 27, 1911. Meeting of the Dutch Antisaloon League.

div.bibl: Onze Toekomst, Jan. 27, 1911. MEETING OF THE DUTCH ANTISALOON LEAGUE.

body.p: p. 1 - The committees of the various branches of the Dutch Antisaloon League, held a meeting last Saturday evening, at the home of Mr. P. Court. Van. Woerden, 6905 Union Ave. The purpose of the meeting was to devise plans so as to increase support for the cause.
It was decided to hold public meetings in the various Dutch churches of Chicago and vicinity, where nationally-known speakers would give addresses.
